mermaid_code:
graph LR
    %%{init: {'theme': 'base'}}%%
    A[Start] --> B{Data Collection}
    B -- Yes --> C[Data Cleaning]
    C --> D[Feature Engineering]
    D --> E{Model Selection}
    E -- Model A --> F[Train Model A]
    E -- Model B --> G[Train Model B]
    F --> H[Evaluate Model A]
    G --> I[Evaluate Model B]
    H -- Better --> J[Deploy Model A]
    I -- Better --> J[Deploy Model B]
    H -- Worse --> K[Tune Model A]
    I -- Worse --> L[Tune Model B]
    K --> F
    L --> G
    J --> M[End]
